title: Anti-corruption banner
description: Photographer's description: over 1100 photos in Tahrir Square; Feb. 14, 2011 to March 18, 2011. Text in Image: لا للفقر والغلاء و البطالة و الفساد و نهب المال العام و لوقف العلاج و لقانون الطوارئ.  Translation of text in image: No to poverty and high prices, unemployment, corruption and plundering of public money, and to stopping medical treatments, and the Emergency Law.
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
